title: Naugatuck Legion out of state tourney | Republican-American
text:
Sports Naugatuck Legion out of state tourney BY ROGER CLEAVELAND REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN July 25, 2024 0 0 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Email Print The inconsistencies of the Naugatuck American Legion baseball team caught up with them Thursday as the Post 17 club had its season come to an end with a 7-0 loss…
